blog.titleLine1: Stay Updated with the Latest News

1.title: Rent Facebook Advertising Accounts
1.excerpt: A safe and effective solution for businesses to rent Facebook advertising accounts.

2.title: Facebook Ad Accounts: A Beginner’s Complete Guide
2.excerpt: In today’s digital era, promoting products and services on social platforms is more important than ever. Facebook has over 2.9 billion monthly active users.

3.title: Run Facebook Ads on a Budget
3.excerpt: Strategies to optimize your advertising budget when running Facebook ads at the lowest cost.

4.title: Optimizing Facebook Ads for Small Businesses
4.excerpt: A step-by-step guide to optimizing Facebook ads for small businesses with limited budgets.

footer.address: 4th Floor, Viet Huong Building, Craft Village, Trieu Khuc, Thanh Tri, Hanoi, Vietnam

highlightProject.title: HIGHLIGHT PROJECT
highlightProject.content: Developed by AKA Media - a pioneer in the field of digital advertising, AKAds provides a reputable Facebook account rental service, proudly accompanying 5,000+ customers over the past 8 years, providing effective, stable and cost-optimized advertising solutions.

paypal.title: Pay with
paypal.description: Secure and convenient international payment method

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What is the minimum deposit amount?
faq.a1: The minimum deposit amount is $5 USD.
faq.q2: How long does it take to process the payment?
faq.a2: PayPal payments are usually processed instantly, but may take up to 24 hours in some cases.
faq.a3: We use the current market exchange rate at the time of transaction, with a small processing fee.
faq.a4: Refunds can be processed within 30 days of the transaction. Please contact our support team.

note.title: Important Note
note.content: Please ensure your PayPal account is verified to avoid any payment issues. International transaction fees may apply depending on your country and bank.

status.pleaseWait: Please wait while we confirm your payment...
status.successMessage: Your balance has been updated successfully!
status.failedMessage: We couldn't confirm your payment. Please try again or contact support.
